data.actual_result: Quick switcher will flash as if it were open before it actually opens
data.short_description: Open and closing the quick switcher multiple times via the "Find or start a conversation" bar will cause the quick switcher to occasionally flash as though it was open before it opens
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord and go to a random DM with a user - Open the DM list and open the close the quick switcher via the "Find or start a conversation" bar multiple times - Observe the animation of the quick switcher opening each time it opens - Make sure to open and close the quick switcher at least 5 times
